column3: Lachy is the coolest dude in pro cycling.
You guys should look into Ruta De Los RU2 in Costa Rica, a great cycling community in Costa Rica!
So cool. Just getting that awesome pink kit would make it all worth it. LOL. Ride on !
Cool race, awesome bucket hats :)Well done guys!
good vid - you could cut out the presenter though, he disappears by the end anyway

Love the riders that are so real and don't try and gloss over the fact that racing is absolutely brutal..and despite being in some of the most beautiful places on Earth, most of the time, these riders are in the hurt locker. Guess that's what makes cycling such a crazy and addicting sport.
whats the Name of the Hoodie - lachlan is wearing at 0:51 ?  Simon is wearing a Transfer jacket at 3:15, Right?? cheers mates, ride on
I thought Lachlan Morton was American???
don't see the stupid ""system six"" crap bike in this vid...  or disk brakes.....
Where can you get the bucket hats please
I was there, I love this race, grande Simon !
more gorgeous filming. Cheers and Ciao!
